title: Exercise 1: Print Message
description: Write a Python program that prints 'Hello CodeNova!'.
tutorial: In Python, use print() to output text. Example: print('Hello World!')

title: Exercise 2: Variables and Addition
description: Create two variables a and b with values 3 and 5, and print their sum.
tutorial: Variables store values. You can use + to add them.

title: Exercise 3: Conditional Logic
description: Write a program that checks if a number is greater than 10 and prints 'Big' or 'Small'.
tutorial: Use if...else to make decisions in code.
